file.name: openapi-schema.yml
file.content:
---
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: Hero API
  description: This API allows CRUD operations on a hero
  contact:
    name: Quarkus
    url: https://github.com/quarkusio
  version: "1.0"
servers:
- url: http://localhost:8083
tags:
- name: hello
- name: heroes
paths:
  /api/heroes:
    get:
      tags:
      - heroes
      summary: Returns all the heroes from the database
      parameters:
      - name: name_filter
        in: query
        description: An optional filter parameter to filter results by name
        required: false
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Gets all heroes
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Hero'
    post:
      tags:
      - heroes
      summary: Creates a valid hero
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Hero'
      responses:
        "201":
          description: The URI of the created hero
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                format: uri
                type: string
        "400":
          description: Invalid hero passed in (or no request body found)
    delete:
      tags:
      - heroes
      summary: Delete all heroes
      responses:
        "204":
          description: Deletes all heroes
  /api/heroes/hello:
    get:
      tags:
      - hello
      summary: Ping hello
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Ping hello
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string
  /api/heroes/random:
    get:
      tags:
      - heroes
      summary: Returns a random hero
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Gets a random hero
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Hero'
        "404":
          description: No hero found
  /api/heroes/{id}:
    get:
      tags:
      - heroes
      summary: Returns a hero for a given identifier
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int64
          type: integer
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Gets a hero for a given id
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Hero'
        "404":
          description: The hero is not found for a given identifier
    put:
      tags:
      - heroes
      summary: Completely updates/replaces an exiting hero by replacing it with the
        passed-in hero
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Hero'
      responses:
        "204":
          description: Replaced the hero
        "400":
          description: Invalid hero passed in (or no request body found)
        "404":
          description: No hero found
    delete:
      tags:
      - heroes
      summary: Deletes an exiting hero
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int64
          type: integer
      responses:
        "204":
          description: Deletes a hero
    patch:
      tags:
      - heroes
      summary: Partially updates an exiting hero
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int64
          type: integer
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Hero'
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Updated the hero
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Hero'
        "400":
          description: Null hero passed in (or no request body found)
        "404":
          description: No hero found
components:
  schemas:
    Hero:
      required:
      - name
      - level
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          format: int64
          type: integer
        name:
          maxLength: 50
          minLength: 3
          type: string
          nullable: false
        otherName:
          type: string
        level:
          format: int32
          minimum: 1
          type: integer
          nullable: false
        picture:
          type: string
        powers:
          type: string

Error: parse: parse spec: paths: /api/heroes/{id}: put: operation "": parse path: path parameter not specified: "id"
